description.hltext_display: Rohstoff Spezial: Seltene Erden: Besonders, aber nicht selten
description.content:
Die Industriekonzerne im DAX sehen die Hysterie um Seltene Erden gelassen – sie haben vorgesorgt. Sorgen um die Hightechmetalle macht sich aber das US-Militär.
Nichts wird so heiß gegessen, wie es gekocht wird. Diese Küchenweisheit gilt auch für Kapitalmärkte – und nicht zuletzt für den spektakulären Preisanstieg der sogenannten Seltenen Erden. Die Industrie benötigt die unter diesem Namen zusammen­gefassten 17 Hightechmetalle für Zukunftstechnologien wie Elektroautos, Windkrafträder oder Smartphones. Allerdings nur in sehr geringen Mengen. Sie sind sozusagen das Salz in der Suppe; deshalb werden sie auch Gewürzmetalle genannt.
In den vergangenen Wochen sorgten Seltene Erden für Streit zwischen den USA, Europa und China. Zwar sind die chemischen Elemente gar nicht so selten, wie ihr Name suggeriert. Versorgt werden die Abnehmer in aller Welt derzeit aber fast ausschließlich von China – mit über 130 000 Tonnen pro Jahr.
Seit einiger Zeit nun reduzieren die Chinesen die Ausfuhr. Schließlich will das Land selbst ein Hightechstandort werden und sich die nötigen Ingredien­zien sichern.
Das sorgt auch hierzulande für Hysterie: „Helle Aufregung“ in den Führungsetagen will die „Süddeutsche Zeitung“ festgestellt haben. Die „Wirtschaftswoche“ erkannte ein „hohes Bedrohungspotenzial“ für deutsche Unternehmen. Der „Focus“ unkte gar über „existenzbedrohende Engpässe“. Siemens sei „besonders betroffen“, dort geriete die Versorgung ins Stocken, mutmaßte „Der Spiegel“.
Doch beim Münchner Technologie­konzern ist von Aufregung nichts zu spüren. „Siemens ist kein direkter Abnehmer der sogenannten Seltenen Erden“, beruhigt Einkaufsvorstand Barbara Kux. Siemens kaufe Produkte, in denen diese bereits verarbeitet sind, wie Seltenerdmagnete aus China, „sodass wir keine Exportrestriktionen befürchten müssen“.
Auch beim Autobauer BMW „erfolgt keinerlei Direktbezug von Seltenen Erden“, betont Chefeinkäufer Herbert Diess. Einen Engpass bei den benötigten Bauteilen „gibt es nicht und ist auch bisher nicht absehbar“, glaubt das Vorstandsmitglied. Ähnlich gelassen geben sich die Wettbewerber Daimler und VW. Die Wolfsburger sehen die Verfügbarkeit „aus heutiger Sicht und vor dem Hintergrund der prognostizierten Stückzahlen unkritisch“.
Lediglich beim Chemieriesen BASF heißt es pauschal: „Durch die verschärfte Quotenregelung der chinesischen Behörden seit Juli 2010 ist die Versorgungssituation mit Seltenen Erden für die deutsche Industrie zunehmend schwierig geworden.“ Wie die eigene Versorgungssituation aussieht, dazu will sich BASF aus Wettbewerbsgründen nicht in die Töpfe gucken lassen.
Erfahren Sie auf der folgenden Seite, ob DAX-Unternehmen wie Infineon, Fresenius oder ThyssenKrupp ausreichend mit Seltenen Erden versorgt sind.
Bildquellen: Siemens AG, ThyssenKrupp AG

description.hltext_display: 日本发生7.4级地震 尚� 人员伤亡财产损失消息
description.content:
日本气象厅22日宣布，当地时间当天凌晨2时20分（北京时间22日凌晨1时20分）许，日本小笠原群岛附近海域发生里氏7．4级地震，日本气象厅已发布了海啸警报。
此次地震震中地点位于东经143．4度、北纬27．5度的小笠原群岛海域，震源深度10公里。包括东京在内的日本东部及东北部地区普遍有震感。
地震发生后，日本气象厅迅速发布了海啸警报，称地震造成的海啸可能在小笠原群岛造成1米高的海浪。日本气象厅还向日本列岛太平洋沿岸的多个城市发布了“海啸提示”，称这些地方可能出现0．5米高度海浪。
截止当天凌晨3时，尚无因这次地震造成人员伤亡和财产损失的消息。

description.hltext_display: City not taking new bids on Scouts' headquarters
description.author: CATHERINE LUCEY
description.content:
City Solicitor Shelley Smith says the administration will not entertain other bids for the Logan Square building that serves as headquarters to the regional Boy Scouts. "The property is under agreement, just like your house would be if you had accepted an offer," Smith said yesterday, responding to a $1.5 million bid by real-estate investor and philanthropist Mel Heifetz. "We're not in a position to entertain other offers for the building at this time." Heifetz, who made the offer Monday, said he acted out of frustration over a proposed settlement the city had reached with the Scouts after a legal dispute over the national organization's ban on gay members. Under the deal, the Scouts would pay $500,000 for the building at 22nd and Winter streets and drop a claim for up to $960,000 in legal fees.
The city has presented the deal - which still requires Council approval - as the best way to end an expensive legal fight. But the agreement has come under fire from gay-rights advocates. Heifetz said that if he was successful, he would donate the building to a charitable organization that does not discriminate.
Told of Smith's response, Heifetz questioned how the city could sell the building without opening it up for bids. Smith said the sale would be done through a quasi-city agency, the Philadelphia Industrial Development Corp., meaning there would be no public bidding process.
Still, Heifetz said the fight wasn't over yet. "I'm just one player in this whole thing, and we'll see how it plays out," he said. "I'm getting calls from all over the country from people who said that it's marvelous that I'm challenging the city." The dispute began with a 5-4 U.S. Supreme Court decision in 2000 that upheld the legality of the national organization's ban on gay Scouts and troop leaders.
That put the organization in conflict with the city charter's ban on discrimination rooted in sexual orientation. In 2007, the city said the regional Scouts organization would have to vacate or begin paying $200,000-a-year rent for its previously rent-free headquarters, built by the Scouts 80 years ago on city-owned property.
The Scouts then sued the city, alleging a violation of First Amendment rights. In June, a federal jury agreed that the city had violated the Scouts' rights, raising the specter that taxpayers might have to pay their legal bills.

description.hltext_display: Cegid Group : Rachète deux nouveaux éditeurs de gestion
description.content:
(Tradingsat.com) - Cegid a annoncé deux nouvelles acquisitions mardi soir. Tout d'abord, le premier éditeur français de logiciel de gestion a acquis 100 % des actions du Groupe VISA, éditeur et distributeur de logiciels de gestion à destination des collectivités territoriales.
Après l'acquisition de la société Civitas en septembre 2008, Cegid marque ainsi sa volonté de renforcer sa position sur le marché des solutions de gestion à destination du secteur public.
Deuxièmement, Cegid a procédé à l'acquisition de 100 % des actions de
la société AXETEAM, éditeur et intégrateur d'une solution de gestion pour les sociétés de service « SYGES ».
Une opération de croissance externe qui permet au groupe de « se dote[r] de nouvelles compétences en vue d'accélérer son développement dans le domaine des logiciels de gestion d'affaires destinés aux sociétés de services ».
P. L. - Copyright (c) 2006-2010 Tradingsat.com. Tous droits réservés.

description.hltext_display: 유병수, "감독님 스타일 맞추기 위해 노력했다"
description.content:
[OSEN=서귀포, 우충원 기자] "감독님 스타일 맞추기 위해 노력했다".조광래 감독이 이끄는 축구 국가대표팀이 22일 제주 서귀포 월드컵경기장에서 자체 청백전을 통해 아시안컵을 위한 국내 훈련을 사실상 마무리했다.
이날 자체 청백전에서 골 맛을 본 유병수(인천)은 아시안컵 대표에 대한 욕심을 나타냈다. 몸 상태도 완벽하게 끌어 올리고 있는 상황이기 때문에 더욱 좋다는 것.
유병수는 훈련을 마친 후 가진 인터뷰서 "전체적으로 몸이 무거웠지만 시간이 지나면서 좋아졌다"면서 "골을 넣기 위해 노력했다. 경쟁력 있는 모습을 통해 기회를 잡기 위해 노력했가"고 소감을 밝혔다. 올 시즌 K리그 득점왕에 오른 유병수는 "몸 상태도 거의 완벽하게 끌어 올리고 있다"면서 "만약 아시안컵에 나서게 된다면 최상의 몸상태가 되어 나갈 수 있다. 더욱 잘 할 수 있는 기회가 될 것"이라고 강조했다. 한편 유병수는 "누가 아시안컵에 나가게 될지 아무도 모르는 상황이다"라며 "어쨌든 열심히 노력했다. 기회를 잡게 될지 모르겠지만 감독님께서 원하는 축구를 하기 위해 노력했가"고 전했다. 10bird@osen.co.kr
화보로 보는 뉴스, 스마트폰으로 즐기는 ‘OSEN 포토뉴스’ ☞ 앱 다운 바로가기

description.hltext_display: 韓国の電気自動車、韓日中３カ国で最も遅れている？（２）
Jahrelang kämpfte der Pay-TV-Anbieter Premiere (jetzt Sky) vergeblich gegen Hacker. Durch billige Sat-Receiver mit gehackter Firmware wurde das Schwarzgucken zum Volksport. Man brauchte nur einen...
description.content:
HD-Pay-TV: Cryptoworks geknackt
Jahrelang kämpfte der Pay-TV-Anbieter Premiere (jetzt Sky) vergeblich gegen Hacker. Durch billige Sat-Receiver mit gehackter Firmware wurde das Schwarzgucken zum Volksport. Man brauchte nur einen "50 Euro Receiver", die passende Firmware drauf und das wars - auch neue Keys wurden automatisch erkannt.
Ende 2008 schaffte es Premiere schließlich durch Umstellung auf das neue Verschlüsselungssystem NDS die Hacker endlich auszuhebeln. Seit dem gab es zwar alle Weile immer wieder Gerüchte und Falschmeldungen, dass auch NDS geknackt wird, aber das ist nicht passiert. Überhaupt sind seit Anfang 2009 eigentlich alle Pay-TV-Sender "schwarz", da auch ausländische Sender ihre Verschlüsselung umgestellt haben.
Jetzt scheint es wieder mal Bewegung in der Pay-TV-Hacker-Szene zu geben. Berichten zu Folge hat ein Hacker namens Kunibert es geschafft, die Pay-TV-Angebote ORF-HD und AustriaSat zu knacken. Austriasat gibt es erst seit Mitte Oktober, umfasst aktuell 15 Sender.
Darunter Zeugs wie Animax, Sat 1 Comedy, 5 MTV/VH1 Musikkanäle und drei Hard-/Softporno-Sender. Dass es ORF und Austriasat gleichzeitig erwischt hat, hat einen simplen Grund. Beide Plattformen verwenden die gleiche Verschlüsselung, Austriasat kann mit einer ORF-Smartcard abonniert werden. Seit Gestern geistert Kuniberts Emulator, der das Verschlüsselungssystem "Cryptoworks" aushebelt, auf den Szene-Webseiten.
Der Emulator wird (wie 2008 üblich) per modifizierter Firmware in Linux-basierte Sat-Receiver eingespielt. Aktuell soll das nur mit diversen Modellen funktionieren. In den Szene-Foren gibt es aktuell erste Berichte, dass es sich diesmal tatsächlich um einen funktionierenden Hack handeln soll.
Michael Nickles meint: Wie gesagt funktioniert der Hack (so er funktioniert) bislang nur mit wenigen Sat-Receivern und es ist ungewiss, wie dauerhaft er ist, wie effektiv ORF und AustriaSat sich dagegen wehren können. Sollte der Emulator funzen, dann wird es gewiss rasch für zig Sat-Receiver portiert.
Im Pechsfall droht ORF und AustriaSat jetzt ein langjähriger Kampf gegen Hacker Kunibert und Co. An Letzteres glaub ich weniger. Die Pay-TV-Anbieter haben aus dem "Premiere-Unglück" gelernt und ich bezweifle, dass es nochmals eine Hackmethode geben wird, die über Jahre hinweg vollautomatisch funktioniert.

description.hltext_display: 基建投资移师农业基础设施
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
手机免费访问 www.cnfol.com 2010年12月22日 16:00 国诚投资
查看评论
继中央经济工作会议后，近日农业部中央农村工作会议拉开帷幕，会议将明确明年中央农村工作的目标和任务，并形成2011年中央“一号文件”的主要内容。
“推进现代农业、确保农产品有效供给”列为2011年的六大任务之一，并将该项任务排在第二的重要位置。谓“现代农业”，即不再以耕地面积、劳动力数量的增加为增产主要原因，而是在农业劳动力将不断减少、耕地面积几乎很难再增加的现实情况下，依靠现代物质、现代科技等要素的投入来发展农业。产业政策重心将转移至农业现代化上，具体反映在以现代科学技术改造农业(如农业机械化、水利化、提高生物育种技术等)和以现代经营方式推进农业 (如农业生产经营的专业化、标准化、规模化和集约化)等方面。
水利建设将是农业投资的重中之重，水利投资主要投向农村饮水安全工程、大中型病险水库除险加固、灌区续建配套与节水改造工程、重大水利项目、江河治理、枢纽水源、行蓄洪区安全建设、海堤、界河、泵站更新改造、水土保持及生态、小水电、水利血防、行业能力建设、中小河流治理、小型病险水库除险加固、小型农田水利建设等17项。考虑到水利基础设施落后，粮食价格上涨速度较快、幅度较大、通胀预期加强，自然灾害频繁发生，节能减排要求等四个方面的原因。水利设施是保障农产品按照既定目标增产，特别是保持农产品产量稳定的关键因素。在通胀压力不断加大的情况下，预计未来水利投资将实现翻倍增长，2011年预计达到4000亿至5000亿左右的规模，十年内总投资有望达到万亿。预计未来十年，固定资产投资的重点将从铁路、公路转移到水利建设。投资的重点区域将主要是13个粮食主产区，主产区的年均水利固定资产投资规模将达到3000亿元，占全国投资规模的75%。预计将涉及大规模水利设施和水电工程设施的承包商、工程建设对水电设备和施工材料的拉动、在农业灌溉和节水方面受益的上市公司，而率先受益的是水利工程承包公司以及当地建材生产企业；其次是水利管材、水电电机等设备制造业务以及节水设备制造商；最后是水电运营商。
在各种农产品中，粮食对食品价格的影响尤为明显。粮价上涨不仅会直接增加居民食品消费支出，还会通过产业链的传导，提高食品饮料加工业的生产成本；或通过饲料业成本的上升，提高肉禽蛋奶水产类产品价格，并带动水果蔬菜价格上涨。从中长期来看，粮食价格具有上升趋势。土地在减少，耕地面积在减少；各项农产品的成本不断提高。通过控制农产品价格来抑制通胀，控制投机、流通领域中的炒作问题已经成为中央共识。今年经济形势变动的主要矛盾就是农产品供给问题，而且农产品供给问题不仅仅是粮食，还扩大到蔬菜、鲜菜等产品上去，再次暴露我们国家经济中的薄弱点是在农业，中央经济工作会议已在很多方面透露明年将公布的一号文件会再次强调加强农业，农产品供给将是一号文件的主要主题。预计生物育种也将成为短期市场热点。因受政策扶持，生物育种板块业绩有望在2011年得到大幅提高，特别是那些具有研发实力或未来有较强意向加强研发实力的公司，股价有望继续走强。
金融政策方面，央行通过各种货币政策工具支持金融机构扩大支农力度。“十二五”期间，要为加速多元农村金融体系建设，强化农村信用社信贷自主定价权，鼓励在风险可控前提下发放低成本农村贷款。引导农村金融机构理性确定金融产品价格，维护资金价格竞争秩序。对农村金融机构贷款定价及利率风险防范机制进行评估，以推进利率市场化的稳健运行。要促进农村金融组织创新，进一步降低农村金融市场准入门槛，拓宽社会资金进入农村金融市场路径，提高农村金融市场民间资本投资比例。积极探索建立有效的信用风险分散转移机制，因地制宜、灵活多样创新信用模式和扩大贷款抵押担保物范围。包括鼓励开展与订单农业相结合的农村信贷、跟单农业产品创新；加快发展农产品期货市场；鼓励商业性保险公司开拓农村保险市场，探索建立农村银保互动机制；鼓励有条件的地区由政府出资、农民和农村企业参股，成立符合现代企业制度的股份制担保基金或担保公司。三是推动现代科技支持农村金融提高服务水平，发展以现代计算机和移动通讯技术为基础的金融产品在农村地区得到更广泛应用，为低成本、低风险在农村地区扩展基础金融服务提供条件。进一步推进农村利率市场化进程。为加速多元农村金融体系建设，可强化农村信用社信贷自主定价权，鼓励在风险可控前提下发放低成本农村贷款。引导农村金融机构理性确定金融产品价格，维护资金价格竞争秩序。对农村金融机构贷款定价及利率风险防范机制进行评估，以推进利率市场化的稳健运行。
今年以来，央行共上调6次法定存款准备金率，其中对农信社等中小法人金融机构，仅上调了3次。目前，农村信用社执行比大型商业银行低6个百分点的优惠存款准备金率，对资产规模小、涉农贷款比例高的农村信用社再降1个百分点。村镇银行的法定存款准备金率比照当地农村信用社执行。此外，央行也运用支农再贷款、再贴现等政策工具支持改善农村金融服务。数据显示，截至2010年第三季度末，全口径涉农贷款余额为11.1万亿元，占各项贷款余额的22.7%，同比增长26.6%。
掘金概念：
1、新股、次新股：“中小板+创业板”市值、净利润占比超四成；
2、产业链整合：基础农业生产极度分散，初现集中趋势；农产品加工走向规模/集约，且进行产业链延伸；农业服务业呈现高科技特征，服务与产品并重成为新特点。
3、行业评级增持，投资涨价受益与产业演进。
4、涨价受益：
猪价上涨带动养殖饲料景气上行，粮价上涨惠及大宗加工，海参受益资产泡沫、消费升级。
5、产业演进：
养殖呈现集约及模式创新；饲料行业走向集中并体现服务价值；

description.hltext_display: 대� � � 수단, 지역 노인복지관서 봉사활동
description.content: ▲ 노인복지관 봉사활동에 나선 대전시티즌 선수들(사진=대전시티즌) [이데일리 SPN 송지훈 기자] 대전시티즌(감독 왕선재) 선수단이 겨울 오프시즌을 맞아 지역 어르신들과 함께 하는 훈훈한 자리를 마련했다. 왕선재 감독을 비롯한 20여명의 대전 선수단은 지난 22일 대전 유성구 소재 노인복지관을 방문해 약 3시간 가량 머물며 봉사활동을 실시했다. 이날 선수단은 어르신들에게 제공되는 점심식사 준비 과정을 돕는 한편 설거지, 배식, 청소 등 다양한 활동을 진행했다. 식사 후에는 독거 노인들을 위한 도시락 배달 봉사, 어르신 그림그리기 프로그램, 어르신들과 탁구치기 등을 통해 훈훈한 정을 나눴다. 이날 선수단이 참여한 점심식사 대접 행사에는 약 250여명의 지역 노인들이 참여해 소중하고 따뜻한 시간을 가졌다. 주방 설거지를 담당한 이현웅은 "계속 서 있어야 하는 주방 일이 생각보다 힘들었다"면서도 "맛있게 식사하고 고마움을 표시하시는 어르신들을 보니 더욱 힘이 났다"며 밝게 웃었다. 도시락 배달 봉사에 참여한 박성호는 "짧은 만남이었지만, 너무나 반가워해주시는 어르신들의 모습에 마음이 따뜻해졌다"며 "팬들의 사랑에 보답하기 위해 주위를 더 둘러보고 지역사랑을 실천하도록 노력하겠다"고 다짐했다. 유성구에서 노인복지관을 운영 중인 우하영 사무국장은 "힘든 훈련일정에도 불구하고 시간을 내 봉사활동에 참여한 대전 선수들에게 감사드린다"면서 "어르신들께서 무척 반가워하셨을 뿐만 아니라 모처럼 우리 복지관에 활기가 넘쳤다"며 이날 행사에 대해 만족감을 감추지 않았다. 이어 "오늘 봉사해 준 선수들을 응원하기 위해 내년에 어르신들과 함께 경기장을 찾겠다"고 약속했다. ▶ HOT스타 연예화보 - 모바일 SPN1008 ＜저작권자ⓒ함께 즐기는 엔터테인먼트 포털 이데일리 SPN＞

description.hltext_display: 【写真】アセナ部隊、アフガニスタンへ出征
Shopper con la R
Χάνεται η ευκαιρία για μια εκτεταμένη ανοδική αντίδραση του Γενικού Δείκτη
Brooking confident over English coaches
description.content:
Sir Trevor Brooking is confident there will be no shortage of top class English candidates to replace Fabio Capello when he eventually leaves his post as England boss.
Despite speculation that he might be lured to Inter Milan as replacement for Rafael Benitez if, as expected, the former Liverpool coach finds his services are no longer required at the San Siro, the Football Association are confident Capello will see out his £6m annual contract.
But once that expires, immediately after UEFA EURO 2012, the feeling within the FA hierarchy is that a domestic appointment should be made. And, while it might only be three years since there was no obvious English contender to succeed the sacked Steve McClaren, Brooking feels the landscape has changed dramatically.
"There are some really talented coaches," observed the FA's director of football development. "There was a frustration in the past because the bigger clubs tended to go overseas. They bought a lot of overseas talent and thought an overseas coach would communicate better.
"That is wrong because it is almost like saying English coaches do not know the best overseas talent. Others said you had to be a former international or you had to have coached in the Champions League.
"English coaches were not getting the chance to prove whether they could do it or not. We had the experience with Steve. At some stage we want to go with it again."
There was a frustration in the past because the bigger clubs tended to go overseas. They bought a lot of overseas talent and thought an overseas coach would communicate better.
Sir Trevor Brooking, FA director of football development
If Capello was lured back to Italy, the hunt would need to begin almost immediately. Certainly Inter would need a coach before England, who are not due in action again until their friendly with Denmark on 9 February.
Such a scenario has already been played down by Capello's camp. And, with former Roma coach Luciano Spalletti and Leonardo, who left AC Milan at the end of last season, at the top of Inter's hit-list, Brooking sees no reason to doubt that stance.
"If you are in this role, you get speculation about that all the time," he said. "I don't know if anything has officially happened as far as Benitez is concerned but from our point of view, Fabio is contracted here until 2012.
"He is doing our qualifying campaign and hopefully we will have a chance to try and have a good tournament in 2012. Until we know otherwise, that is how we will go on."

description.hltext_display: Jahrelang kämpfte der Pay-TV-Anbieter Premiere (jetzt Sky) vergeblich gegen Hacker. Durch billige Sat-Receiver mit gehackter Firmware wurde das ...
description.content:
HD-Pay-TV: Cryptoworks geknackt
Jahrelang kämpfte der Pay-TV-Anbieter Premiere (jetzt Sky) vergeblich gegen Hacker. Durch billige Sat-Receiver mit gehackter Firmware wurde das Schwarzgucken zum Volksport. Man brauchte nur einen "50 Euro Receiver", die passende Firmware drauf und das wars - auch neue Keys wurden automatisch erkannt.
Ende 2008 schaffte es Premiere schließlich durch Umstellung auf das neue Verschlüsselungssystem NDS die Hacker endlich auszuhebeln. Seit dem gab es zwar alle Weile immer wieder Gerüchte und Falschmeldungen, dass auch NDS geknackt wird, aber das ist nicht passiert. Überhaupt sind seit Anfang 2009 eigentlich alle Pay-TV-Sender "schwarz", da auch ausländische Sender ihre Verschlüsselung umgestellt haben.
Jetzt scheint es wieder mal Bewegung in der Pay-TV-Hacker-Szene zu geben. Berichten zu Folge hat ein Hacker namens Kunibert es geschafft, die Pay-TV-Angebote ORF-HD und AustriaSat zu knacken. Austriasat gibt es erst seit Mitte Oktober, umfasst aktuell 15 Sender.
Darunter Zeugs wie Animax, Sat 1 Comedy, 5 MTV/VH1 Musikkanäle und drei Hard-/Softporno-Sender. Dass es ORF und Austriasat gleichzeitig erwischt hat, hat einen simplen Grund. Beide Plattformen verwenden die gleiche Verschlüsselung, Austriasat kann mit einer ORF-Smartcard abonniert werden. Seit Gestern geistert Kuniberts Emulator, der das Verschlüsselungssystem "Cryptoworks" aushebelt, auf den Szene-Webseiten.
Der Emulator wird (wie 2008 üblich) per modifizierter Firmware in Linux-basierte Sat-Receiver eingespielt. Aktuell soll das nur mit diversen Modellen funktionieren. In den Szene-Foren gibt es aktuell erste Berichte, dass es sich diesmal tatsächlich um einen funktionierenden Hack handeln soll.
Michael Nickles meint: Wie gesagt funktioniert der Hack (so er funktioniert) bislang nur mit wenigen Sat-Receivern und es ist ungewiss, wie dauerhaft er ist, wie effektiv ORF und AustriaSat sich dagegen wehren können. Sollte der Emulator funzen, dann wird es gewiss rasch für zig Sat-Receiver portiert.
Im Pechsfall droht ORF und AustriaSat jetzt ein langjähriger Kampf gegen Hacker Kunibert und Co. An Letzteres glaub ich weniger. Die Pay-TV-Anbieter haben aus dem "Premiere-Unglück" gelernt und ich bezweifle, dass es nochmals eine Hackmethode geben wird, die über Jahre hinweg vollautomatisch funktioniert.

description.hltext_display: X-markets-Kolumne: Palladium: Unverändert in Rallye-Laune?
description.content:
Doch es gab und gibt 2010 auch noch andere Edelmetalle, die einem als Anleger Freude bereiten können. Eines davon ist Palladium, das wohl den meisten privaten Anlegern als zu „exotisch“ erscheint. Dennoch lohnt es sich unter Renditeaspekten, dieses silberweiß glänzende Metall ebenfalls einmal genauer anzuschauen.
Jetzt mit Produkten der Société Générale in Rohstoffe investieren.
Palladium ist in der Tat ein interessantes Investment. Es ist härter als Platin, lässt sich aber sehr gut schmieden und wie Gold zu dünnen Folien auswalzen. Häufig wird Palladium als „das günstigere Platin“ bezeichnet, was daran liegt, dass beide Edelmetalle einige Ähnlichkeiten bezüglich ihres chemischen Verhaltens aufweisen und Palladium in der Natur fast immer zusammen mit Platin auftritt. Daher ist es auch nicht verwunderlich, dass in der Industrie bei einer Platin-Knappheit verstärkt Palladium als Substitut nachgefragt wird.
Verwendet wird Palladium vor allem in der Autoindustrie, im Elektrobereich und in der Medizin. Insbesondere die Automobilbranche dürfte das Edelmetall künftig wohl stärker benötigen. Denn Palladium wird auch in Brennstoffzellen als Elektrodenmaterial verwendet und dient im zukünftigen Wasserstoffauto als Speichermaterial für Wasserstoff. Einen – wenn auch geringeren – Bedarf an Palladium gibt es zudem in der Schmuckindustrie: Denn Weißgold ist eine Gold-Palladium-Legierung mit einem Goldanteil von circa 60 bis 80%. Die Legierung wird gerne in Ringen und Schmuckstücken verwendet. Kurzum: Palladium ist ein vielseitig verwendbares Edelmetall, das beispielsweise an der New York Mercantile Exchange und am London Bullion Market gehandelt wird.
Ein Blick auf die Preisentwicklung zeigt, dass eine Investition in dieses Edelmetall vor allem in den letzten Monaten Freude und Rendite erbracht hat. Bis zum Ausbruch der Finanzkrise war der Palladiumpreis im Aufwind. Am 20. Dezember 2005 notierte er bei 256,00 Dollar, am 20. Dezember 2006 bei 326,00 Dollar. Ein Jahr später, am 20. Dezember 2007, lag Platin bei 353,50 Dollar. In der Folge kam es zu einem finalen Anstieg bis auf den damaligen Höchststand, der im März 2008 bei 592,50 Dollar erreicht wurde.
Die Wirtschaftskrise sorgte anschließend auch bei Palladium für eine massive Abwärtsbewegung. Anfang Dezember 2008 fiel der Preis bis auf ein Tief von 157,00 Dollar zurück. Von hier aus leitete ein Doppeltief die Wende und eine nachhaltige Aufwärtsbewegung ein. Am 19. Dezember 2008 stand die Notierung bei 176,50 Dollar. Im Verlauf des Jahres 2010 setzte sich der Anstieg kontinuierlich fort. Nachdem der Preis Ende April noch knapp unter seinem alten Hoch von 2008 nach unten gedreht hatte, gelang im Oktober der Ausbruch über die runde 600-Dollar-Marke nach oben.
Dem Ausbruch auf neue Höchststände folgte ein weiterer Anstieg. Anfang Dezember dieses Jahres markierte der Palladiumpreis sein vorläufiges Hoch bei 776 Dollar und konsolidiert seitdem in einer engen Seitwärtsbewegung. Nach der aktuellen Konsolidierung könnte aus charttechnischer Sicht die dynamische Aufwärtsbewegung der vergangenen Monate ihre Fortsetzung finden. Risikobereite Investoren könnten mit dem Wave-Call der Deutschen Bank (WKN DE3KRV) auf einen weiteren Anstieg spekulieren. Der Hebel dieses Papiers liegt derzeit bei 3,44, das Stop-Loss-Niveau bei aktuell 552,65 Dollar.
Rutscht der Palladiumpreis unter die untere Begrenzung der aktuellen Seitwärtsrange bei rund 710 Dollar, könnte dies zunächst charttechnisch betrachtet eine weitere Korrektur in Richtung 625 Dollar nach sich ziehen. Auf fallende Notierungen könnten spekulative Anleger mit dem Wave-Put der Deutschen Bank (WKN DE3UJ9) setzen. Der Hebel beläuft sich hier aktuell auf 10,23, das Stop-Loss-Niveau liegt derzeit bei 798,25 Dollar.
Bei beiden genannten Wertpapieren sind Anleger einem Währungsrisiko ausgesetzt.
Stand: 22.12.2010
Dieses Dokument ist eine Werbemitteilung und die enthaltenen Angaben stellen keine Anlageberatung dar. Die Wertentwicklung der Vergangenheit ist kein verlässlicher Indikator für künftige Wertentwicklungen. Eine Anlage in die genannten Wertpapiere ist mit einem Totalverlustrisiko verbunden und eine Investitionsentscheidung sollte nur auf Grundlage des für die genannten Wertpapiere allein maßgeblichen Prospekts getroffen werden. Dieser kann unter www.xmarkets.de heruntergeladen oder bei der Deutsche Bank AG, CIB, GME X-markets, Große Gallusstraße 10-14, 60311 Frankfurt, kostenfrei angefordert werden.
Nicolai Tietze ist verantwortlich für die Hebelprodukte des X-markets Teams der Deutschen Bank. Vor seinem Einstieg in das X-markets Team war er bei der Deutschen Bank Aktienhändler und dort zuständig für die deutschen Konsumwerte. In seiner Funktion als Derivate-Experte entwickelt er auch Strategie- und Themenzertifikate.
Der obige Text spiegelt die Meinung des jeweiligen Kolumnisten wider. Die finanzen.net GmbH übernimmt für dessen Richtigkeit keine Verantwortung und schließt jegliche Regressansprüche aus.

description.hltext_display: 奥巴马推迟休假忙游说 美参院今或批准� �裁军条约
description.content:
美国参议院外交关系委员会主席克里宣布结束辩论
新华社今日上午电
美国国会参议院21日投票决定终止就新的美俄核裁军条约进行的辩论。由于目前已有至少10名共和党参议员表示支持，因此该条约有望在22日的参议院全体投票中通过，这将是奥巴马政府上台以来在对外政策上取得的为数不多的重大胜利。
终止辩论 22日投票
美国参议院当天在程序性投票中以67票对28票，决定终止就该条约进行的辩论，参议院将于22日就该条约进行全体投票。
原本该条约在参议院需要67票才能通过，但是由于一名民主党参议员因病缺席，这一门槛变为66票。目前民主党手中握有58票，因此只要取得9名共和党参议员的支持，条约就能通过。
截至当日，已经有包括共和党参议院三号人物拉马尔·亚历山大在内的10名共和党参议员表态支持这一核裁军条约，也就是说参议院目前已经有足够票数批准这一条约。
美国总统奥巴马和俄罗斯总统梅德韦杰夫今年4月在捷克首都布拉格签署了新的《削减和限制进攻性战略武器条约》，以替代已于去年失效的旧条约。新条约规定，7年内两国部署的战略核运载工具数量将削减到700件以下，此外各自可部署的核弹头将减至1550枚，削减幅度近三分之一。但即便如此，美俄两国的核弹头数量仍将占全世界总量的90％以上。
赶在今年过堂参院
奥巴马上台近两年来，巴以直接谈判重启后中断，美军依然深陷阿富汗战争泥潭，美国国内经济和失业问题未见起色，民主党在中期选举中遭遇惨败，他可谓内外交困。因此，奥巴马政府迫切希望保住核裁军条约这一为数不多的对外政策成果之一。
由于民主党在今年国会中期选举中失去了5个参议院席位，如果拖到明年，该条约的通过将变得更加困难，因此奥巴马政府和民主党正全力推动参议院在今年底之前批准这一条约。
奥巴马为此推迟了前往夏威夷的圣诞节休假，并在近日亲自给关键的共和党参议员打电话进行游说。副总统拜登和国务卿希拉里·克林顿21日也罕见地亲赴国会进行游说。
奥巴马政府和民主党强调，拖延该条约的通过将把美国国家安全至于风险之中并且对“重启”美俄关系的努力造成重大打击。但反对此条约的共和党人士认为，该条约会对美国的反导弹防御计划带来不利影响，他们还对新条约中核武器核查机制的变化表示担忧。

description.hltext_display: Beurre Nantais
description.content:
Les informations nutritionnelles données correspondent à une portion du plat pour un adulte. Pour un enfant, une femme, un sportif etc...les calories et AJR de la recette sont accessibles ici
Les informations nutritionnelles sont données à titre indicatif et peuvent varier en fonction de la cuisson, de l'origine des ingrédients etc...
Par ailleurs les calculs peuvent ignorer certains ingrédients pour lesquels les données sont incomplètes ou parce qu'ils sont non significatifs.
Le calcul peut aussi être approximatif en tenant compte d'ingrédients ne faisant pas partie du plat final, mais juste de la préparation ( bouillon de légume, marinade etc...)
Les données proviennent pour l'essentiel de la base d'information ©FCEN ( Fichier Canadien des Eléments Nutritifs ) et dans certains cas très particuliers du ©guide des aliments 2008/2009 ( Cohen/Serog )
En aucun cas les indications fournies ne permettent la réalisation d'un quelconque régime alimentaire : Si tel est votre besoin, consulter un spécialiste ( médecin, nutritionniste, diététicien )
ATTENTION : le service est encore "expérimental" - n'hésitez pas à nous signaler toute anomalie

description.hltext_display: 조광래 감독, "손흥민, 아시안컵에 데� �가� 싶다"
description.content: [스포탈코리아=제주] 이경헌 기자= 한국 축구 국가대표팀의 조광래 감독이 '슈퍼탤런트' 손흥민(18, 함부르크)의 아시안컵 최종 명단 발탁 가능성을 시사했다. 대표팀은 대표팀은 22일 오후 3시 제주도 서귀포시 제주월드컵경기장에서 자체 미니게임을 가졌다. 이날 경기서 대표팀은 곽태휘(왼쪽 발목)와 이상덕(오른쪽 종아리)의 부상으로 인해 10명씩 나뉘어 전후반 30분씩 강도 높은 실전 훈련을 펼쳤다. 이날 가장 주목을 끈 주인공은 단연 손흥민이었다. 측면 공격수로 나선 손흥민은 비록 공격 포인트를 쌓지 못했지만 폭넓은 움직임과 날카로운 슈팅력을 선보이며 이를 지켜보던 조광래 감독의 얼굴을 흐뭇하게 만들었다. 앞서 조광래 감독은 지난달 독일 현지로 건나가 손흥민의 경기를 직접 관전하며 그에 대한 전체적인 평가를 마친 상태다. 손흥민은 조광래 감독이 직접 관전한 경기에서 시즌 2,3호골을 잇따라 작렬시키며 자신의 잠재력을 유감없이 뽐낸 데 이어 약 37시간에 달하는 귀국길에도 불구하고 제주 전훈에서 인상적인 활약을 펼치며 자신의 진가를 재확인시켰다. 훈련이 끝난 뒤 가진 인터뷰에서 조광래 감독은 손흥민의 아시안컵 대표팀 발탁 가능성을 시사했다. 그는 "오늘 플레이에 만족한다. 기대 이상의 모습이었다. 코칭 스태프와 상의를 해봐야 하겠지만 개인적으로 손흥민을 아시안컵에 데려가고 싶다"라고 말했다. 이어 그는 23인의 아시안컵 최종 엔트리에 대한 구상을 거의 끝마쳤다고 밝혔다. 1~2명의 자리는 부상 및 기타 변수에 따라 달라질 수 있다는 게 그의 생각이었다. 그는 "오늘 게임을 통해 1~2명의 자리를 더 고민해봐야 할 것 같다. 자리는 최전방 공격수와 측면 공격자원"이라고 말했다. 사진=이연수기자 전세계 축구뉴스를 내 손안에, 모바일스포탈코리아닷컴(m.sportalkorea.com)

description.hltext_display: A股开户数终结四周跌势 持仓帐户再创新高
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
受A股上周止跌反弹提振，市场人气终结连续四周的回落走势。中登公司最新披露的数据显示，上周新增开户数环比小幅增长。且持仓帐户数继续攀升，连续第七周创出历史新高。
数据显示，2010年12月13日-12月17日当周，新增A股开户数为28.64万户，较前一周微增2.43%，结束11月中旬以来的回落走势；新增B股开户数为788户，环比减少0.63%。截至12月17日，沪深两市共有A股账户1.54亿户，B股账户249.85万户；有效账户1.334亿户。
A股持仓帐户数依然连续第九周回升，再度刷新新高记录。截止上周末，A股持仓账户数为5584.16万户，较前一周增加8.59万户，A股帐户的持仓比例升至36.86%。同时，参与交易的A股账户数也止跌回升，从1464.48万户增至1693.23万户。
上周A股市场结束连续五周以来的跌势，上证指数全周上涨1.85%，重新收复备受关注的年线支撑。因中国央行此前宣布上调存款准备金率而不是加息，加上中央经济工作会议确定明年宏观经济政策的基本取向要积极稳健，大大舒缓了市场对于政策收紧的担忧。

description.hltext_display: ‘翼をもたない天使’ハン・ジミン、仁寺洞で街頭募金
Emulator von Hacker Kunibert
description.content:
HD-Pay-TV: Cryptoworks geknackt
HD-Pay-TV: Cryptoworks geknackt
Jahrelang kämpfte der Pay-TV-Anbieter Premiere (jetzt Sky) vergeblich gegen Hacker. Durch billige Sat-Receiver mit gehackter Firmware wurde das Schwarzgucken zum Volksport. Man brauchte nur einen "50 Euro Receiver", die passende Firmware drauf und das wars - auch neue Keys wurden automatisch erkannt.
Ende 2008 schaffte es Premiere schließlich durch Umstellung auf das neue Verschlüsselungssystem NDS die Hacker endlich auszuhebeln. Seit dem gab es zwar alle Weile immer wieder Gerüchte und Falschmeldungen, dass auch NDS geknackt wird, aber das ist nicht passiert. Überhaupt sind seit Anfang 2009 eigentlich alle Pay-TV-Sender "schwarz", da auch ausländische Sender ihre Verschlüsselung umgestellt haben.
Jetzt scheint es wieder mal Bewegung in der Pay-TV-Hacker-Szene zu geben. Berichten zu Folge hat ein Hacker namens Kunibert es geschafft, die Pay-TV-Angebote ORF-HD und AustriaSat zu knacken. Austriasat gibt es erst seit Mitte Oktober, umfasst aktuell 15 Sender.
Darunter Zeugs wie Animax, Sat 1 Comedy, 5 MTV/VH1 Musikkanäle und drei Hard-/Softporno-Sender. Dass es ORF und Austriasat gleichzeitig erwischt hat, hat einen simplen Grund. Beide Plattformen verwenden die gleiche Verschlüsselung, Austriasat kann mit einer ORF-Smartcard abonniert werden. Seit Gestern geistert Kuniberts Emulator, der das Verschlüsselungssystem "Cryptoworks" aushebelt, auf den Szene-Webseiten.
Der Emulator wird (wie 2008 üblich) per modifizierter Firmware in Linux-basierte Sat-Receiver eingespielt. Aktuell soll das nur mit diversen Modellen funktionieren. In den Szene-Foren gibt es aktuell erste Berichte, dass es sich diesmal tatsächlich um einen funktionierenden Hack handeln soll.
Michael Nickles meint: Wie gesagt funktioniert der Hack (so er funktioniert) bislang nur mit wenigen Sat-Receivern und es ist ungewiss, wie dauerhaft er ist, wie effektiv ORF und AustriaSat sich dagegen wehren können. Sollte der Emulator funzen, dann wird es gewiss rasch für zig Sat-Receiver portiert.
Im Pechsfall droht ORF und AustriaSat jetzt ein langjähriger Kampf gegen Hacker Kunibert und Co. An Letzteres glaub ich weniger. Die Pay-TV-Anbieter haben aus dem "Premiere-Unglück" gelernt und ich bezweifle, dass es nochmals eine Hackmethode geben wird, die über Jahre hinweg vollautomatisch funktioniert.

description.content:
En version individuelle ce flan est absolument délicieux et fin. Je l'avais servi avec quelques pointes d'asperges vertes, blanchies, pour apporter une touche de couleur supplémentaire a l'assiette. Marie

Les informations nutritionnelles données correspondent à une portion du plat pour un adulte. Pour un enfant, une femme, un sportif etc...les calories et AJR de la recette sont accessibles ici
Les informations nutritionnelles sont données à titre indicatif et peuvent varier en fonction de la cuisson, de l'origine des ingrédients etc...
Par ailleurs les calculs peuvent ignorer certains ingrédients pour lesquels les données sont incomplètes ou parce qu'ils sont non significatifs.
Le calcul peut aussi être approximatif en tenant compte d'ingrédients ne faisant pas partie du plat final, mais juste de la préparation ( bouillon de légume, marinade etc...)
Les données proviennent pour l'essentiel de la base d'information ©FCEN ( Fichier Canadien des Eléments Nutritifs ) et dans certains cas très particuliers du ©guide des aliments 2008/2009 ( Cohen/Serog )
En aucun cas les indications fournies ne permettent la réalisation d'un quelconque régime alimentaire : Si tel est votre besoin, consulter un spécialiste ( médecin, nutritionniste, diététicien )
ATTENTION : le service est encore "expérimental" - n'hésitez pas à nous signaler toute anomalie
Préparation : 30 minutes
Cuisson : 55 minutes
Difficulté : Facile
Coût de la recette : Cher
Partager Tweet
Ingrédients
1 kg d'Asperges
5 Oeufs
Sel, Poivre
1 cuillère à soupe de Lait en Poudre
5 cuillères à soupe de Lait
8 brins de Ciboulette
200 g de Langoustines
Préparation de la recette
Beurrez le moule souple.
Epluchez les asperges. Coupez les queues. Cuisez-les la tête en haut en fagot pour que les têtes restent croquantes. Puis posez-les sur un linge.
Faites pré-chauffer le four à 220°C.
Coupez et réservez les têtes des asperges. Essuyez les blancs dans le linge.
Mixez les blancs avec les oeufs, les laits, le sel et le poivre.
Versez la préparation dans les demi-sphères du moule souple. Ajoutez les pointes d'asperges dans chacun des moules.
Faites cuire à 200°C au bain-marie pendant 40 minutes environ.
Pendant ce temps, préparez une sauce à la crème et aux langoustines.
Une fois cuit, démoulez chaque flan dans une assiette individuelle préalablement chauffée. Disposez les queues de langoustines et versez la sauce tout autour. Cisellez de la ciboulette et décorez l'assiette.

description.hltext_display: Thủ thuật Photoshop: Làm ảnh với tông màu cổ hoài niệm
description.content:
Với một vài thủ thuật photoshop, bạn có tể biến những bức ảnh chụp bình thường sang những bức ảnh mang tông màu cổ đượm một chút buồn.
Ảnh gốc
(click để xem ảnh lớn)
Bước 1
Mở bức ảnh cần chỉnh sửa lên trong Photoshop.
Bước 2
Các bạn nhân đôi layer background bằng cách sử dụng tổ hợp Ctrl + J hoặc nhấn chuột phải chọn Duplicate Layer và chuyển layer Background copy sang đen trắng bằng cách giảm Saturation hoặc sử dụng Gradient Map như các bài trước đã hướng dẫn.
Chuyển layer Background copy sang chế độ hòa trộn Multiply.
Sau khi hoàn thành bước này, các bạn sẽ được một bức ảnh như dưới đây
Bước 3
Để thay đổi sáng/tối trên ảnh, các bạn mở tính năng điều chỉnh Curves bằng bảng Layer/New Adjust Layer/Curves hoặc làm như trong hình.
Điều chỉnh thông số của thanh Curves như trong hình dưới đây
Bước 4
Chọn chế độ Solid Color trong bảng Layer như hình minh họa. Trong bảng màu các bạn sử dụng mã màu # 625611
Chọn chế độ hòa trộn Color Dodge cho layer Solid Color và đặt thông số Fill là 36% và giữ nguyên thông số Opacity.
Kết quả, các bạn sẽ có bức ảnh như dưới đây
Bước 5
Tiếp tục tạo một layer màu nữa bằng Solid Color, layer này sẽ được đặt tên là Color Fill 2, các bạn chọn mã màu # 46208b và chế độ hòa trộn Exclusion cùng với thông số Opacity là 33%.
Khi kết thúc bước này sẽ cho các bạn kết quả như sau:
Bước 6
Chọn chế độ Brightness / Contrast trong bảng Layer
Và điều chỉnh các giá trị như hình minh họa dưới
Bước 7
Nhân đôi layer background bằng lệnh Ctrl + J, các bán sẽ được một layer mới tên là Background Copy 2
Tạo một layer Curves ngay trên layer background copy 2 và điều chỉnh các thông số thanh Curves như hình bên dưới
Bước 8
Tạo 1 layer Curves với tên gọi Curves 3 như trong hình.
Them noi dung chi tiet cua hinh anh
Và điều chỉnh các thông số của thanh Curves trên layer này.
Bước 9
Tạo 1 layer Solid Color với mã mầu # 493d66 và thiết lập thông số Opacity là 24%
Bước 10
Tùy vào từng bức ảnh cụ thể mà các bạn có thể tinh chỉnh thông số Opacity cũng như fill cho phù hợp để ra một bức ảnh theo đúng ý mình. Đối với bức ảnh này, chúng tôi sửa lại một chút thông số của từng layer để có thể hoàn thiện hơn.
Các bạn có thể làm theo như hình dưới đây:
Và đây là kết quả của bức ảnh sau khi Retouch.

description.hltext_display: Aantal octrooien Siemens naar 58.000
description.content:
DEN HAAG (AFN) - Onderzoekers en ontwikkelaars van het Duitse technologieconcern Siemens hebben in het afgelopen boekjaar 8800 uitvindingen gedaan. Dat zijn er veertig per dag, ofwel 15 procent meer dan in het voorgaande jaar. Het totaal aantal octrooien nam toe van 56.000 vorig jaar tot 57.900 dit jaar, meldde Siemens woensdag.
Volgens het bedrijf is het innovatievermogen van Siemens daarmee opnieuw aangetoond. Topman Peter Löscher van Siemens AG onderscheidde onlangs in München nog twaalf succesvolle onderzoekers en ontwikkelaars als 'Uitvinder van het jaar’, onder wie de Nederlander Frans Ladru. Samen zijn ze goed voor ongeveer 1300 verleende octrooien.

description.hltext_display: 日産副社長「電気車専用車体で開発のリーフ、大人５人が楽に乗車」
20年出任5次总理1次总统 黑山总理辞职意在欧盟
description.content:
久卡诺维奇把“厌倦执政生活”归为辞职原因，不过在一些政治分析师看来，他的请辞，意在推动黑山加入欧洲联盟。
数月来，久卡诺维奇多次放出消息，称自己厌倦高层政治活动，愿在商界一展身手。久卡诺维奇21日作完年度政府报告后，召开新闻发布会，宣布辞职，但继续担任执政党黑山社会主义者民主党主席。
几天前，黑山共和国成功当选欧盟成员候选国。久卡诺维奇说，他已完成任务，带领黑山向加入欧洲联盟以及北大西洋公约组织迈进一步。
1991年，年仅29岁的他首次出任黑山总理，成为当时欧洲最年轻总理。过去20年中，他5次出任总理、1次当选总统，仅在2006年底至2008年初短暂弃政从商。
久卡诺维奇当天提名卢克希奇出任总理。黑山议会最早28日投票选举新总理。按德新社说法，卢克希奇是久卡诺维奇的 “亲密盟友”，如果由他出任总理，内阁应该不会出现大变动。
尽管久卡诺维奇自称厌倦执政，但反对党称，总理下台是因为身受内外压力，包括涉嫌走私烟草、整治腐败不力等。反对党呼吁立即重新选举。
久卡诺维奇驳斥“被迫辞职”传言：“我辞职问心无愧……所做的一切都能接受公众和历史的审判。 ”
一些政治分析师认为，黑山国内腐败严重，犯罪率居高不下，致使欧盟反复拖延协商黑山入盟事宜。而久卡诺维奇的退出和卢克希奇的上台或许能为黑山入盟“加分”。

description.hltext_display: Apple hat jetzt eine "inoffizielle" Wikileaks-App aus dem App-Store gelöscht, mit der sich Wikileaks-Dokumente abrufen ließen. Laut Bericht von ...
description.content:
Wikileaks-App von Apple gelöscht
Applehat jetzt eine "inoffizielle" Wikileaks-App aus dem App-Store gelöscht, mit der sich Wikileaks-Dokumente abrufen ließen. Laut Bericht von THINQ.co.uk wurde die App von einem russischen Entwickler namens Igor Barinov am 10. Dezember eingereicht und von Apple sieben Tage später freigeschaltet.
Jetzt, drei Tage nach Verkaufsstart hat Apple die Anwendung rausgeworfen. Barinov hat die App für 1,99 Dollar angeboten, wobei 1 Dollar als Spende an Wikileaks gehen sollten. Mit den restlichen 99 Cent wollte er Apples Anteil und seine Entwicklungskosten finanzieren. Bereits am Montag sollen mit der App rund 2.800 Dollar verdient worden sein.
Jetzt wird natürlich diskutiert, warum Apple sich zum Rückzieher entschlossen hat. Tatsache ist wohl, dass es in den App-Entwicklungsrichtlinien eine Klausel gibt, die besagt, dass Apps mit denen Spendengelder gesammelt werden, grundsätzlich kostenlos sein müssen.
Spendengelder dürfen nur über eine Webseite in Safari oder per SMS eingeholt werden, nicht durch den App-Verkauf selbst. Eine Stellungsnahme von Apple gibt es bereits nicht. Natürlich gehen jetzt viele davon aus, dass Apple auf Druck der US-Regierung gehandelt hat, beziehungsweise den bereits im Vorfeld vermeiden wollte.
Michael Nickles meint: Wie immer man es dreht, Apple hat sich den schwarzen Peter kassiert. Richtig ist auf jeden Fall, dass die besagte Klausel in den App-Entwicklungsrichtlinien existiert, sich Apple darauf berufen kann.
Aber macht diese Richtlinie wirklich Sinn? Eigentlich hätte der Entwickler der App ja einfach nur nicht mitteilen müssen, dass er an Wikileaks spendet, es einfach tun können. Damit stellt sich aber die Frage, ob er mit der App und der "Spendenmitteilung" lediglich selbst zum Kauf motivieren und kassieren wollte.
Zieht man Apples Anteil von den verbleibenden 99 Cent ab, bleibt gewiss pro App nicht viel für den Entwickler übrig - aber Kleinvieh macht bekanntlicherweise auch Mist. Natürlich hat Barinov gewiss die Möglichkeit, die App erneut einzustellen und komplett kostenlos anzubieten - oder Apples "Spendenregulierung" zu befolgen.
Erst dann wird sich rausstellen, ob Apple den schwarzen Peter verdient hat.

description.hltext_display: Probation for chiropractor in insurance fraud
description.author: MICHAEL HINKELMAN
description.content:
A Bucks County chiropractor who participated in a scheme to bilk Independence Blue Cross of almost $2 million was sentenced yesterday to three years' probation and ordered to perform 450 hours of community service.
U.S. District Judge Gene E.K. Pratter gave Dr. Raymond W. Brozek, 57, of Telford, a big break after Assistant U.S. Attorney Anita Eve filed a motion for leniency based on "substantial" assistance from Brozek that led to charges against others.
Two other defendants in the case - Michael Karp and Mark Levin - were sentenced to prison terms of six months and a year and a day, respectively, in September and last month.
Brozek, who is no longer practicing and likely faces suspension of his license, is working as a chauffeur. He admitted yesterday that he had made a "terrible, terrible mistake." Authorities said Levin, 65, and Karp, 39, who is Levin's son-in-law, owned Hatfield Athletic Club and Rehab One, a chiropractic office at the club.
The men hired Brozek to work there from 2004 to 2006. Levin demanded that Hatfield workers be seen by Brozek as often as possible so he could bill IBC, prosecutors said.
Prosecutors said Brozek followed his superiors' directions and caused fraudulent bills to be submitted for treatments either he didn't perform or that weren't medically necessary.
Authorities said Brozek also prepared bogus bills that were used to submit claims to IBC that represented services provided to Hatfield workers, who were encouraged and forced to sign Rehab One's patient log regardless of whether they were treated.
At the direction of Karp and Levin, Brozek created office notes and other documents that included fictitious procedure codes and false depictions of symptoms and clinical findings, which were used to prepare bills submitted to IBC.
Authorities said the defendants submitted almost $2 billion worth of medical bills to IBC, resulting in payments from IBC of $399,882.
The three defendants must make a combined restitution of $399,822 to IBC.

description.hltext_display: Bàn phím ảo Swype bản beta mới cho Android
description.content:
Swype giới thiệu bàn phím ảo phiên bản Beta mới hoàn toàn miễn phí cho hệ điều hành Android.
Bàn phím ảo Swype cho hệ điều hành Android
Khác hẳn với phiên bản cũ, Swype bản beta thứ hai này khắc phục được một số lỗi ở bản đầu tiên và phát triển nhiều tính năng mới như Double-Tap-to-Edit, Cursor Restore, và Voice-to-Text.
Phiên bản này hỗ trợ cho các thiết bị sở hữu màn hình độ phân giải HVGA (320 x 480 pixel), WVGA ( 800 x 480 pxel) và FWVGA (854 x 480 pixels).
Ở bản Swype beta đầu tiên, nếu muốn sử dụng bạn phải có một thiết bị đã được cài đặt sẵn phần mềm, nhưng với phiên bản beta mới nhất này, bạn chỉ cần đăng kí sử dụng trên Website Swype là có thể tải phần mềm bàn phím về.
Bàn phím ảo Swype phiên bản mới cho nền tảng Android này hết sức tiện lợi với kiểu nhập liệu bằng cách dùng các ngón tay nối các ký tự lại với nhau tạo thành chữ chứ không giống như cách mà các bàn phím ảo đã có trước đó.
Ứng dụng này cũng hoàn toàn miễn phí. Bạn có thể tải ứng dụng trên kho ứng dụng Android Market.

description.hltext_display: New Zealand GDP to Dictate NZDUSD Price Action as the Pair Displays a Lackluster Performac
description.content:
(DailyFX via COMTEX News Network) --
Economic activity in New Zealand is expected to rise 0.1 percent in the third quarter after climbing 0.2 percent the quarter prior, while the annualized rate is forecasted to rise 1.8 percent, according to the median estimate of economists' surveyed by Bloomberg News. Dec 22
New Zealand GDP
Expectations: 0.1%
Prior: 0.2%
Fundamental Outlook
Economic activity in New Zealand is expected to rise 0.1 percent in the third quarter after climbing 0.2 percent the quarter prior, while the annualized rate is forecasted to rise 1.8 percent, according to the median estimate of economists' surveyed by Bloomberg News. Traders should not rule out a dismal GDP report tonight as the region's worst earthquake in approximately eight decades weighs on household spending, while the unemployment rate remains volatile. Meanwhile, retail sales in October fell at the fastest pace in more than 13 years as confidence in the recovery losses momentum. Looking ahead, the GDP report may show that imports rose at a faster pace than exports as the strong New Zealand dollar boosted import volumes.
Taking a look at the credit Suisse Overnight Index swaps, traders are pricing in 61 basis point increase in the central bank's key overnight lending rate over the next 12 months. This is important to note due to the fact that economic expansion as indicated by growing activity leads to inflationary pressure. Thus, a dismal report will not only add downward pressure on the kiwi, but will also lower interest rate expectations. Therefore, the central bank may maintain its accommodative policy heading into 2011 in order to allow the recovery to gather pace. As the fundamental developments in New Zealand have shown a lackluster performance as of late, a dismal GDP report should not be overlooked, which will in turn validate the bearish NZDUSD technical outlook.
Technical Outlook
NZDUSD Daily Chart
Charts Created Using FXCM's Strategy Trader - Prepared by Michael Wright
NZDUSD: The pair has halted its two day advance during the overnight trade and now looks poised to continue its southern journey as technical indicators continue to point to additional losses. The MACD has yet to reverse course after painting a bearish picture in the middle of November. At the same time, price action recently slipped below a rising trend line which provided a line of support for the pair for approximately six months. I will remain short from 0.7483 as my bias remains to the downside.
For More Technical Analysis Visit the DailyFX Technical Page
Written by Michael Wright, Currency Analyst
To Receive Future Articles by Email, please contact me at mwright@fxcm.com

description.hltext_display: BAM bouwt scholen in deelgemeente Londen
description.content:
BUNNIK (AFN) - BAM heeft met London Borough of Camden Council, een deelgemeente van Londen, financiële overeenstemming bereikt over de bouw van drie scholen. Dat maakte de bouwer woensdag bekend.
Met de opdracht is een investering gemoeid van circa 90 miljoen euro. De financiering daarvan wordt verstrekt door verzekeraar Aviva. Het betreft de bouw van een academisch pand voor University College London en een school voor speciaal onderwijs voor kinderen van 3 tot 19 jaar.
Verder staan de bouw en renovatie van South Camden Community Secondary School op het programma. De bouwwerkzaamheden gaan direct van start. De oplevering van de eerste school is voorzien in juni 2012, aldus BAM.

description.hltext_display: A股开户数终结四周跌势 持仓帐户再创新高
description.author: info@cnfol.com
description.content:
受A股上周止跌反弹提振，市场人气终结连续四周的回落走势。中登公司最新披露的数据显示，上周新增开户数环比小幅增长。且持仓帐户数继续攀升，连续第七周创出历史新高。
数据显示，2010年12月13日-12月17日当周，新增A股开户数为28.64万户，较前一周微增2.43%，结束11月中旬以来的回落走势；新增B股开户数为788户，环比减少0.63%。截至12月17日，沪深两市共有A股账户1.54亿户，B股账户249.85万户；有效账户1.334亿户。
A股持仓帐户数依然连续第九周回升，再度刷新新高记录。截止上周末，A股持仓账户数为5584.16万户，较前一周增加8.59万户，A股帐户的持仓比例升至36.86%。同时，参与交易的A股账户数也止跌回升，从1464.48万户增至1693.23万户。
上周A股市场结束连续五周以来的跌势，上证指数全周上涨1.85%，重新收复备受关注的年线支撑。因中国央行此前宣布上调存款准备金率而不是加息，加上中央经济工作会议确定明年宏观经济政策的基本取向要积极稳健，大大舒缓了市场对于政策收紧的担忧。

description.hltext_display: Paris Ouverture : Le Cac 40 marque une pause, Hermès bondit, Ingenico chute
description.author: John Wiburg
description.content: La Bourse de Paris marque une pause dans les premiers échanges. Les valeurs financières cèdent du terrain, tandis que Veolia Environnement gagne 0,8% à la suite d'informations évoquant un contrat pour des lignes ferroviaires en Allemagne. Hermès International progresse de 4,7% après la montée de LVMH à son capital. Le numéro un mondial du luxe cède 0,7% Enfin, Ingenico abandonne 3,6% alors que le groupe a précisé qu'il n'avait reçu aucune offre ferme et ne menait aucune discussion. A 9h05, le Cac 40 cède 0,04% à 3.925 points.

description.hltext_display: Live grenade found at Auckland mail centre
description.content:
A suspected live grenade found by the Auckland International Mail Centre near Auckland Airport has been taken away by the Defence Force.
Police and fire services evacuated the mail centre building in Laurence Stevens Drive just before 5pm and closed off part of the road. The building and road have both now reopened, police said.
The Defence Force bomb disposal squad took the suspicious item, thought to be a grenade, for further examination, police said.
Police believed the grenade, which was found by a staff member, came into the building through the mail service.
Auckland International Airport terminals were unaffected.

description.hltext_display: Christian Bautista wants to explore a new sound for 2011; reveals his wish for Ogie and Regine
description.content:
Hindi matawaran ang pasasalamat ng singer na si Christian Bautista dahil maganda ang itinakbo ng 2010 para sa kanya, hindi lang sa kanyang recording career kundi sa acting na rin.
Nakausap ng PEP (Philippine Entertainment Portal) si Christian sa pagpirma niya sa isang endorsement deal noong Huwebes, Disyembre 16, sa Johnny Rockets, Tomas Morato, Quezon City.
Sa panayam na ito ay ikinuwento ni Christian ang mga nangyari sa kanyang career ngayong taon. Idinetalye rin ng singer, na sikat na sikat sa Southeast Asia, ang iba pang mga personal na bagay tungkol sa kanya.
"The music career is doing very well," saad ni Christian bago magsimula ang signing deal. "The Romance Revisited album is triple platinum. Just a Love Song in Indonesia is double platinum. I might go to some Asian countries next year."
Para raw sa 2011, naghahanap si Christian ng bagong tunog, para na rin ma-excite ang kanyang mga tagahanga.
"Yun nga, I wanna do something else next year. I wanna do something exciting. I wanna do something different.
"In terms of music, I'm looking for a new sound. I actually tweeted it. I tweeted, 'Who has a song, any song. Email me.' "I'm not just banking on the mainstream composers. Kasi meron diyang magagaling, e.
"Actually, may mga nagsa-submit, ang gaganda, e. We'll never know," saad niya.
Ibig sabihin ba nito ay makikipagtrabaho lamang siya sa mga bagong composer para maka-discover ng mga bagong talento?
"Collaborating with new composers or old composers, depende, kung ano talaga yung... Malalaman mo yun, e, pag narinig mo yun," sagot niya.
Pagpapatuloy ni Christian, hindi naman malaki ang magiging pagbabago. "It's definitely still a ballad. Para naman hindi magulat yung tao. Baka mamaya, nag-Gloc-9 rap na ako, di ba? Although I love Gloc-9.
"A new ballad. A ballad for this generation na, who will again spread like wildfire sa Asia, or something like that.
"If I should do a Mandarin song, if I should do a Bahasa song, anything, I'm open." Meron na bang nagpadala ng mga kanta sa kanya?
"Meron," sagot ng 29-year old singer.
"There was a Singaporean, na nag-submit ng Mandarin. Merong Indonesian na nag-submit ng Indonesian. Merong English, merong Pinoy.
"Ayun, iniisa-isa ko lang kung ano yung maganda. I will present it to my label, my manager, what is good."
ACTING. Ngayong 2010 din nakagawa ng major movie si Christian Bautista. Ito ay ang Jayden's Choir, na ginawa sa Indonesia, kung saan dagsa-dagsa rin ang kanyang mga tagahanga.
Saad ni Christian, natapos na nila ang pagsu-shooting sa pelikula. Dubbing na lang daw ang kulang at maipapalabas na ito sa Marso 2011.

description.hltext_display: Neue Aufregung
description.content:
Wikileaks-App von Apple gelöscht
Applehat jetzt eine "inoffizielle" Wikileaks-App aus dem App-Store gelöscht, mit der sich Wikileaks-Dokumente abrufen ließen. Laut Bericht von THINQ.co.uk wurde die App von einem russischen Entwickler namens Igor Barinov am 10. Dezember eingereicht und von Apple sieben Tage später freigeschaltet.
Jetzt, drei Tage nach Verkaufsstart hat Apple die Anwendung rausgeworfen. Barinov hat die App für 1,99 Dollar angeboten, wobei 1 Dollar als Spende an Wikileaks gehen sollten. Mit den restlichen 99 Cent wollte er Apples Anteil und seine Entwicklungskosten finanzieren. Bereits am Montag sollen mit der App rund 2.800 Dollar verdient worden sein.
Jetzt wird natürlich diskutiert, warum Apple sich zum Rückzieher entschlossen hat. Tatsache ist wohl, dass es in den App-Entwicklungsrichtlinien eine Klausel gibt, die besagt, dass Apps mit denen Spendengelder gesammelt werden, grundsätzlich kostenlos sein müssen.
Spendengelder dürfen nur über eine Webseite in Safari oder per SMS eingeholt werden, nicht durch den App-Verkauf selbst. Eine Stellungsnahme von Apple gibt es bereits nicht. Natürlich gehen jetzt viele davon aus, dass Apple auf Druck der US-Regierung gehandelt hat, beziehungsweise den bereits im Vorfeld vermeiden wollte.
Michael Nickles meint: Wie immer man es dreht, Apple hat sich den schwarzen Peter kassiert. Richtig ist auf jeden Fall, dass die besagte Klausel in den App-Entwicklungsrichtlinien existiert, sich Apple darauf berufen kann.
Aber macht diese Richtlinie wirklich Sinn? Eigentlich hätte der Entwickler der App ja einfach nur nicht mitteilen müssen, dass er an Wikileaks spendet, es einfach tun können. Damit stellt sich aber die Frage, ob er mit der App und der "Spendenmitteilung" lediglich selbst zum Kauf motivieren und kassieren wollte.
Zieht man Apples Anteil von den verbleibenden 99 Cent ab, bleibt gewiss pro App nicht viel für den Entwickler übrig - aber Kleinvieh macht bekanntlicherweise auch Mist. Natürlich hat Barinov gewiss die Möglichkeit, die App erneut einzustellen und komplett kostenlos anzubieten - oder Apples "Spendenregulierung" zu befolgen.
Erst dann wird sich rausstellen, ob Apple den schwarzen Peter verdient hat.

description.hltext_display: Four months to re-enter Pike River mine, receivers say
description.content:
Pike River Coal's receivers say it could be up to four months to re-enter the mine in which 29 workers died in an explosion last month.
Receivers PricewaterhouseCoopers today presented a draft plan for re-entry to the ill-fated mine at a meeting with police today.
The draft plan was prepared by a panel of technical experts including company staff, mines rescue personnel from New Zealand and Australia and other subject expertise.
The plan contains two phases. Firstly, it suggests some additional work to stabilise the mine, including sealing the cracks in the ground to help reduce the flow of gases out of the mine.
Secondly, it sets out a plan to enter the mine to recover the remains of the 29 workers. This is dependent on the mine environment.
As he left the meeting a representative for the receivers said it could be up to four months before re-entry to the mine was possible.
The plan had been given to Police Commissioner Howard Broad and would be peer reviewed.
Tonight Mr Broad said the plan required detailed consideration by police force and its advisers.
"This will take several weeks."
Police would retain control of the work to stabilise the mine in the meantime.

event_or_fact.property: the plan required detailed consideration by police force and its advisers

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM (AFN) - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak, bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.

description.hltext_display: 진동수 "정부 주도MA, 자금성격 검토할 것"
description.content: 앵커멘트 현대건설 매각을 둘러싸� 야기된 갈등이 재발하는 것을 막기 위해 � �부가 매각 � �차를 보완하기로 했습니다. 최환웅 기자가 � �합니다. 리포트 진동수 금융위원장이 오늘 � �례 기자간담회를 통해 � �부 자금이 들어간 기업을 M&A시장에 매물로 내놓을 때는 매수자금의 성격도 파악하� 다� 밝혔습니다.[인터뷰] 진동수 / 금융위원장"(현대건설 매각에 대해) 아쉬운 � �은 시스템을 좀더 � �치하게 했어야 했다는 � �입니다. 좀 더 세� �된 방식의 시장과의 소통을 위한 노� �이 필요하다는 � �을 느꼈습니다."금호아시아나그룹이 대우건설을 인수한 뒤 겪은 이른바 `승자의 � �주` 와 같은 부작용을 막으� �면 인수 기업의 지배구조도 투명해� �야 한다� 강조했습니다.인수 기업의 경영진이 너무 높은 가격을 � �시해 기업 � �체의 재무구조가 위험해질 우� �가 있을 때는 이사회나 소액주주의 이익을 보호하기 위한 장치 등을 통해 인수를 막아야 한다는 지� �입니다.하지만 금융당국의 사� �� �인 개입에 대해서는 조심스런 입장을 밝혔습니다.[인터뷰] 진동수 / 금융위원장"� �는 가능한 한 시장에 사� �개입을 하거나 군림하� 지시하는 것보다는 시장과 소통을 해야한다� 생각합니다."M&A나 금융회사의 지배구조와 관� �해 � �부가 � 수 있는 일은 � �도 보완이라는 설명입니다.� �축은행의 부실과 관� �해서는 대주주들이 책임을 지� 자구노� �을 해야하지만 시간이 너무 걸릴 경우 � �부가 나서� 다� 밝혔습니다.[인터뷰] 진동수 / 금융위원장"내년 상반기에는 � �축은행 문� �를 해결하기 위한 큰 가닥을 잡아나가� 습니다."진 위원장은 또 "자동차보험을 개� 하기 위해 부처간에 합의� 수 있는 부분은 올해 안으로 합의를 마치� 내년에 추가� �인 논의를 통해 보완해 나갈 것"이라� 덧붙였습니다.머니투데이 방송, 최환웅입니다.[최환웅MTN기자 ]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: 우승후보 KCC 판도변화 핵심 되나
description.content: '슬로 스타터'전주 KCC의 상승세가 심상치 않다. KCC는 21일 인천 전자랜드를 87-71로 대파하면서 최근 4연승의 고공비행을 이어갔다. 아직 순위는 7위(10승12패)지만 한때 승수와 패수의 차이가 -6까지 벌어졌던 것을 고려하면 가파른 상승 페이스다. KCC를 단숨에 '우승후보'다운 모습으로 탈바꿈시킨 주인공은 단연 하승진(25)과 전태풍(30)이다. 사실상 두 선수의 부활이 KCC의 약진으로 이어지고 있다는 평가다. 하승진은 최근 4경기에서 평균 24분34초를 소화하며 평균 17.8점 9리바운드 1블록슛을 기록하고 있다. 특히 이 기간 야투 성공률이 무려 81.5%다. 27개를 던져 22개를 적중시킬 만큼 고감도 슛 감각을 자랑하고 있다. 자연히 골밑에서의 위력도 배가되고 있다. 또 4연승 동안 하승진은 자유투 44개 중 27개(61.4%)를 넣었다. 최대 단점으로 지적되던 자유투 적중률까지 높이고 있는 것이다. '야전사령관'전태풍의 진두지휘도 결정적이다. 왼 허벅지 부상으로 한동안 코트에서 불안한 모습을 보였던 전태풍은 최근 4경기에서는 평균 15.5점 5.3어시스트 2.3리바운드 1.5스틸로 맹위를 떨쳤다. 3점슛은 15개 중 10개를 넣으며 66.7%의 성공률을 기록했다. 정교한 3점포와 과감한 돌파, 현란한 패스로 상대 수비를 무너뜨리고 있다. 하승진과 전태풍이 화려하게 부활한 KCC는 공수의 '질'면에서도 이전과는 전혀 다른 팀으로 변모했다. KCC는 4연승 전까지 평균 득점이 79.2점으로 실점(80.8점)보다 적었다. 하지만 4연승 동안 평균 득점이 86.8점인 반면 실점은 73점밖에 되지 않았다. 야투 성공률도 4연승 기간 51.3%에 이른다. 야투 허용률은 43.6%밖에 안 될 만큼 상대 공격은 철저하게 봉쇄했다. 리바운드는 평균 34개를 걷어냈고, 28개밖에 내 주지 않았다. 여기에 외국인선수 크리스 다니엘스와 제럴드 메릴도 각자 임무에 충실하고 있다. 매 시즌 초반 부진하다가 서서히 '시동'을 거는 KCC의 위력이 이번 시즌에도 재현될 조짐이다. 한국아이닷컴 인기기사 ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ ㆍ 성환희기자 hhsung@sphk.co.kr [ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: History on the Line When Jayhawks Come to Town
description.content:
Kansas is highest-ranked non-conference opponent to come to Berkeley since the two teams squared off in 1956
Related Articles »
Flowers Blossoms in Second Half, Leads Southern Mississippi Past Cal - Mon, Dec 13, 2010
Live Blog: Cal Men's Basketball vs. Southern Miss - Sun, Dec 12, 2010
Daily Cal Staff Writer
Date Added Tuesday, December 21, 2010 | 11:14 pm
Last Updated Tuesday, December 21, 2010 | 11:24 pm
Category: Sports > Winter > Basketball (Men's)
One win away from another milestone in a career rife with accomplishments, Mike Montgomery smiled when asked about the possibility of winning his 600th career game on Wednesday night.
"It'd be a nice Christmas present, wouldn't it?" Montgomery said.
Saddled with its toughest test of a difficult non-conference slate, the Cal men's basketball team would give Montgomery not only the landmark victory but his biggest win since he arrived in Berkeley if it beat No. 3 Kansas (10-0) tonight at Haas Pavilion.
The Jayhawks arrive in Berkeley for their first true road game of the season, having played all 10 of their games at either at home at Phog Allen Fieldhouse or at a neutral site. This is the first time that Kansas has come to Berkeley since 1956 when the legendary Wilt Chamberlain led the Jayhawks and there should be no shortage of people to watch. Haas Pavilion is expected to sell out for the first time this season when the game tips off at 8 p.m.
One of, if not the most tradition-rich college basketball program in the nation (the program's founder, James Naismith, is credited with inventing basketball), Kansas arrives with another great team that is expected to make a run to the Final Four come March. Despite losing their top three players (Cole Aldrich, Sherron Collins and Xavier Henry) to the NBA Draft last year, the Jayhawks feature another talent-rich squad whose most heralded player is a true freshman.
Labeled by pundits as the best first-year to enter Lawrence since the legendary Danny Manning, Josh Selby excited Jayhawk Faithful in his first game by hitting the game-winning three-point shot with 26 seconds remaining to defeat USC, 70-68, on Saturday. The Baltimore, Md., native finished his collegiate debut with a game-high 21 points on five for 11 shooting.
"As a premiere freshman, (Selby) is going to make them better," Montgomery said. "The first shot I saw him take was pure from deep. It looked awfully good and I know he's athletic."
Though Selby will almost certainly present Cal with problems, it is Kansas's depth that concerns Montgomery most.
"They'll continually run quality players at you," Montgomery said. "They have eight, nine, ten guys that all play hard, all know what they are doing and all defend very well. It may be difficult from the standpoint of attrition in terms of wearing us down."
While only two players on this season's Bears (Jorge Gutierrez and Markhuri Sanders-Frison) appeared in the 84-69 loss last season at Kansas, it was depth that buried Cal in that game. All five Jayhawks' starters, including returners Marcus Morris and Tyshawn Taylor, scored in double figures in last year's game that anchored the Jayhawks' victory.
The Bears' biggest challenge may come in the post, where Harper Kamp and Markhuri-Sanders Frison will face the unenviable task of defending and blocking off twin brothers Marcus and Markieff Morris. Standing 6-foot-10 and 245 pounds, Markieff leads the Big-12 in rebounding with nine boards per game and has recorded three double-doubles this season.
"They're both good players," Kamp said about the twins. "I've got to keep the defense that I always play. They've got a good system that they run with each other. They run a lot of pick and rolls and they like to go high-low. We've definitely got our hands full."
Cal marks the fourth Pac-10 team that Kansas has faced this season. Coach Bill Self's squad has already defeated Arizona, UCLA and USC, prompting Montgomery to joke that the Jayhawks are "first place in the Pac-10 right now." Those three games, however, have been the toughest that Kansas has played this year, beating the opposition by only 11 combined points.
And with this game being the first true road test for Kansas, Kamp and the rest of the young Bears will try to channel the spirit of St. Nicholas tonight for Montgomery's landmark victory.
"I don't have a gift for him yet, but that would be a good Christmas present for me, also," Kamp said. "I'd like to get him 600 wins against an opponent like Kansas. That would be great. But, just to get that win in general, would be a great feeling, and winning at home."
Tags: CAL MEN'S BASKETBALL, HARPER KAMP, MIKE MONTGOMERY, KANSAS MEN'S BASKETBALL, BILL SELF, JOSH SELBY

description.hltext_display: Two trapped in Bay of Plenty head-on crash
description.content:
Emergency services have freed two trapped motorists from their vehicles following a serious head on collision in the Bay of Plenty.
The accident happened at the intersection of State Highway 2 and Manoeka Road, just north of Te Puke.
There were two cars involved in the crash and both had sole occupants.
The two drivers had been freed and taken to hospital by ambulance, a northern communications spokeswoman said.
The road would be closed for about two hours. Diversions were in place, but were not suitable for heavy vehicles, police said.
No other details were immediately available.

description.hltext_display: Jefferies stuft OMV-Aktien bei Erstbewertung mit "
description.content:
Die Analysten von Jefferies haben die Aktien der heimischen OMV bei ihrer Erstbewertung mit "underperform" eingestuft. Das Kursziel wurde von den Wertpapierexperten mit 25,00 Euro festgelegt. So berichtet der Informationsdienstleister Bloomberg.
Zum Vergleich: An der Wiener Börse notierten OMV-Aktien kurz nach Handelsbeginn mit einem Plus von 0,77 Prozent bei 30,64 Euro.

description.hltext_display: Our gift to you: Favorite staff recipes for Christmas
description.content:
At The Tennessean, we're thankful for you, our readers, for graciously giving us your tried-and-true recipes. You send them scrawled on pieces of notebook paper, typed out on stationery or zipped off in e-mails. You've sent your instructions for perfect bruschetta, given us ideas for our bumper crop of summertime tomatoes and shared the secrets behind your "world-famous" chili, not to mention all the award-winning pies and passed-down sweet potato casseroles.
At all times of the year, you deliver.
So this Christmas, we wanted to return the favor with a few of our own favorites, to help you start your day off right on Dec. 25.
BACON CRACK
Submitted by Shopping Diva Cathi Aycock
This bacon recipe nearly caused a fight at a brunch I hosted this Christmas. It was so good, all my girlfriends wanted the last piece. Since we had pomegranate-and-Champagne cocktails, the fighting was a tiny bit blurry, but we decided this caramelized bacon was highly addictive and dubbed it "Bacon Crack."
The lovely thing about this recipe? One of my girlfriends assured me that you can eat anything high in fat and calories this time of year because of the "It's Christmas" rule. She says you go back to oatmeal and fruit post-holiday, so not indulging is practically criminal!
1/2 cup brown sugar
1 tablespoon Dijon mustard
1/4 pound thick cut bacon (Don't buy regular bacon, thick cut is a must.)
Cooking spray
Large Ziploc bag
1. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line a baking sheet and its sides with aluminum foil. Place a wire cooling rack in the pan. Spray the cooling rack with cooking spray. Combine brown sugar and mustard in Ziploc bag. Add bacon and toss to coat.
2. Put bacon on the cooling rack (you can crowd them a bit as they will shrink). Bake for about 20 minutes or until bacon is cooked through and slightly crisp on the edges.
3. The bacon will cool with a shiny exterior and is good hot or at room temperature. You can bake ahead and then reheat in the microwave if desired.
GINGERBREAD PANCAKES WITH BAKED EGGS
Submitted by Food Editor Kristin Whittlesey
We have had Christmas Eve brunch with family friends since their daughter and I were about 3. We used to go to some cheesy mall in the Virginia suburbs to see Santa, but as the kids got older, we started trading off hosting duties at our houses.
Last time we hosted at our house, these pancakes were the star of the meal. We served them with a baked egg recipe from The World's Finest, a cookbook that my grandmother, Suzanne Holloway, wrote when she was food editor of the Tulsa World.
GINGERBREAD PANCAKES
These are dense, moist pancakes. Serve them piping hot with sautéed apples or pears and lots of maple syrup.
Makes 24 servings
1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour
1 teaspoon baking powder
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1/4 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
1/4 teaspoon ground cloves
1 3/4 cup buttermilk
2 eggs
1/4 cup molasses
2 teaspoons freshly grated ginger
3 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted
Oil or cooking spray
1. Sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and cloves. Set aside.
2. In a separate bowl, blend the buttermilk, eggs, molasses, ginger and butter.
3. Blend buttermilk mixture into the flour mixture and mix until just blended.
4. Heat a large nonstick skillet or griddle over medium heat. Brush with oil or spray. Drop the batter onto the hot skillet in large spoonfuls. Cook until small bubbles appear, adjusting the heat as necessary. Flip the pancakes to the other side using a spatula and cook until firm. Serve immediately.
Adapted recipe from Cox News Service, Atlanta.
EGGS BAKED IN SAUCE
For junior cooks and adults, this recipe was included in a cooking school class for sixth graders.
3 tablespoons butter
3 tablespoons unsifted all-purpose flour
Dash pepper
3/4 teaspoon salt
1 teaspoon mustard
1 1/2 cups milk
1/4 pound American cheese, shredded
6 eggs
Canadian or regular bacon
3 English muffins, split
1. About 45 minutes before serving, melt butter in medium saucepan. With wire whisk or fork, stir in flour, pepper, salt and mustard. Stir in milk and cook, stirring, until smooth and thickened. Add cheese and stir until it melts.
2. Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Pour half of cheese sauce into greased 10-by-6-by-2-inch baking dish.
3. Break an egg into a saucer, then carefully slide it into the sauce. Repeat with remaining eggs, placing them side by side. Carefully pour remaining sauce over eggs. Bake 20-25 minutes or until eggs are as done as your family prefers.
4. Meanwhile, in large skillet, sauté bacon. Toast muffins. When eggs are ready, place half a muffin on each plate. Top with an egg and cover with sauce. Serve with bacon slices.
Recipe from The World's Finest, by Suzanne Holloway.
SAUSAGE BALLS
Submitted by Metromix Director Heather Byrd and Niche Content Editor Ellen Margulies
My whole family gets together on Christmas Eve and starts baking sugar cookies, blonde brownies, caramel fudge squares and holly globs, but I'm always in charge of the sausage balls. I never use a recipe. I just keep adding ingredients (cheddar cheese, spicy sausage, Bisquick, milk, cayenne pepper) until the consistency is right, which means, depending on how many Christmas cocktails we've had while baking, we are likely to end up with a massive batch of sausage balls. They're also never the same shape or size, but they sure are tasty!
— Heather Byrd
Everyone in the family has to arrive and eat breakfast before we all traipse into the den for presents. My mom makes the sausage and cheese balls in advance, since they freeze beautifully and cook up in a jiffy. While we're opening presents, people tend to sneak back into the kitchen to snitch some leftover sausage and cheese balls. It just wouldn't be Christmas without them!
— Ellen Margulies
SAUSAGE & CHEESE BALLS
1 pound spicy breakfast sausage, such as Wampler's or Tennessee Pride
1 pound sharp cheddar cheese
3 cups baking mix, such as Bisquick
1. Let sausage and cheese come to room temperature. Shred the cheese.
2. Put a third of each ingredient in a large food processor. Blend until a ball is formed. Dump into a mixing bowl, roll into smaller balls and place on a parchment-covered baking sheet. Repeat twice more until all ingredients are mixed and rolled.
3. Bake 12-15 minutes in a preheated 400-degree oven.
Note: These can be made ahead and frozen in an airtight container or on the baking sheet, covered in plastic wrap. Freeze, covered, on a baking sheet until firm. Then store in a freezer bag or an airtight container until ready to bake. Do not thaw before baking.
DRIED PLUM CAKE
Submitted by Society Editor Rusty Terry
Aunt Noona's Dried Plum Cake is a must-have for the Beatty Christmas family reunion. I make it with a hot caramel sauce that makes the cake more pudding-like.
DRIED PLUM CAKE
1/2 cup vegetable oil
3/4 cup sugar
2 eggs
1 cup all-purpose flour (do not use self-rising)
1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
1/2 teaspoon nutmeg
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/2 cup buttermilk
1/2 cup chopped, cooked dried plums (I cook them following the package directions, then drain them and let them cool before starting the rest of the cake.)
1/2 cup pecans, chopped
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a loaf pan or square pan. (Even if the pan is nonstick, you should still grease it or the cake won't come out of the pan in one piece.)
2. Mix together the oil, sugar and eggs. In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, baking soda and salt.
3. Alternately add the dry ingredients and buttermilk to the oil, sugar and egg mixture. Then add the dried plums and nuts and stir to combine. Pour into pan and bake for 35-40 minutes, until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
SAUCE FOR DRIED PLUM CAKE
1 cup sugar
1/2 cup buttermilk
1 stick butter, cut up
1/2 teaspoon baking soda
2 teaspoons light Karo syrup
1 teaspoon vanilla
1. Mix all ingredients together in tall saucepan over medium heat.
2. Once the mixture begins to boil, reduce heat and cook until thickened. You want it thick, but thin enough to be a sauce, not an icing.
Rusty's note: You must keep a close eye on this, because it has a tendency to bubble out, and it is a mess if it gets on your stove!

description.hltext_display: Fires blaze as wind hits Canterbury
description.content:
Canterbury firefighters will be battling two major fires through the night as hot dry winds stoke up the region. Are you in the area? Do you have photos? Email us at newstips@stuff.co.nz Over 60 firefighters along with helicopters and emergency crews are working to contain a large fire in Waimate in South Canterbury, which ignited yesterday afternoon and later spread into forest. The fire has so far damaged over 178 hectares of gorse and native vegetation.
Also at risk is 120 hectares of 29 year old forestry.
"Due to the size of the fire, we elected to bring in a regional incident management team. There is currently personnel from seven agencies working together to keep this fire contained," South Canterbury Rural Fire principal officer Rob Hands said.
Police closed State Highway 82 between Hodges Road and Parkers Bush Road, in Waimate, due to the blaze. "Helicopters and crews continue to work, as the wind conditions allow, to keep the fire within the existing boundaries. At this point it looks as though we will achieve that," incident controller Bryan Jensen said.
High winds and heat have set off a spate of fires in the past 24 hours from Invercargill to North Canterbury.
In North Canterbury, a large fire near Amberley at Leithfield Beach had forced the evacuation of two households.
There were 70 firefighters battling that blaze and the two families had been evacuated in case a wind change threatened their homes overnight, Area Commander Dan Coward said.
"The last I heard they were still fighting the fire but didn't believe it was spreading further," he told NZPA.
The fire had so far spread over three kilometres.
Canterbury firefighters late this afternoon contained another fire near Rolleston, near Christchurch.
A blaze threatened nearby properties for a while and several houses had to be evacuated by police before it was contained.
No injuries have been reported in any of the fires.

description.hltext_display: 中小指数能上15000点吗
description.content:
在昨天的文章中笔者指出伴随着今日主力资金在权重板块的大举流入和以金融地产板块为首的普涨，随后该类板块再次出现整理也就成为大概率事件，但是小整理无关大局，对于投资者来讲接下来如何操作依然非常明确，借用上周末的收评文章就是大家要充分利用节前所剩无几的交易时间，珍惜节前每一次主力打压散户的机会，坚定不移的建仓，调仓并锁仓。
以今天走势来看，昨日领涨的金融地产板块今日全线整理，因此也就提供给投资者买入的机会。需要了解的是，像金融地产这样的大盘权重股，在行情没有正式启动之前，涨一天往往伴随着的就是持续几天甚至十几天的整理，但由于上证指数目前的点位较低，使得这类股票虽然一跌就是数日，但是跌幅累积起来是很小的，因为这个原因，这类股票往往一涨就是一阳吞数阴。
根据以上特点，显然投资者在投资该类股票时是不能以短线思维来对待的，具体来说就是不要祈求可以买到最低点，只要股价足够低就可以了，买入之后天天跌没关系，因为涨一天顶上跌几天甚至几十天。这里会有投资者问，为什么笔者近期持续建议大家要买入这样的大盘蓝筹股呢？道理很简单，我们先看399101中小指数，目前位于7716点，翻番就是15000点，上证指数2877点，翻番是5700点，单从这一点上来看，你说中小指数涨到到15000点的可能性大还是上证指数到5700点的可能性大呢？所以，如果你认为中小指数能上15000，那么你就继续买入股价高的吓人的众多小盘股，如果你认为上证指数能上5700，那么就坚定不移的买入股价和市盈率都低的可怜的大盘蓝筹股。

description.hltext_display: Rapist, murderer refused parole
description.content:
Convicted murderer and rapist Peter Howse has once again been denied parole.
And Howse - sentenced to preventive detention in 1999 - continues to deny any sexual offending.
The 61-year-old was handed his open-ended prison sentence after being found guilty of a third sex attack committed while on parole for the 1982 murder of his then girlfriend, Susan Keenan, in Palmerston North.
He appeared before the Parole Board on November 23, with a report following the hearing stating a psychological report placed him at "high risk of further offending".
"The problem centres round his acceptance of what he has done in the past," the Parole Board said.
"He accepts that he has been violent and had a serious drug and alcohol problem. He says he has had this for many years.
"He denies any sexual offending and that covers a number of different victims across a period of time.
"He is also confident that there was not adequate evidence to convict him on the sexual charges and so there is a sense of injustice which lies with him as well."
As Howse denies all sexual offending, he has not been able to attend intensive programmes aimed at rehabilitating rapists.
The board referred to an "excellent report" it had received from officials at Howse's undisclosed prison.
He was described as "compliant and polite". He worked in the prison garden.
The board considered implementing a postponement order meaning Howse might not be able to seek parole in 2011.
The board opted to "defer" the issue and will instead consider it again when he reappears for parole in 12 months time.
Howse has almost 80 convictions dating back to the early 1960s. Many of those convictions are for assaults on women.
In 1991 he kidnapped and indecently assaulted a 17-year-old girl, along with his younger brother Bruce, on the outskirts of Palmerston North.
In 2002 Bruce Howse was sentenced to life imprisonment with a minimum 28-year non-parole period for the murder of his step-daughters, Saliel Aplin, 12, and Olympia Jetson, 11.
